channel.title: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
channel.description: Seriously, the game's amazing. AC2's gameplay is refined into prime shape, the combat mechanics are actually effective now, and there's more variety and things to do than ever. Plus, multiplayer! Discuss.

item.title: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I just got first place because I tricked one of my pursuers to kill a civilian

I was the doctor, and in the last minute of the game, I just joined a group of civilians with two doctors, and disguised myself, and got like, 200 points because he killed the wrong person. Then I just ran for the last 20 seconds, laughing because I got bumped up to first Got two achievements that game, too! (750 points in a kill, and escape your pursuer within 10 seconds of killing your target)

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I got further in the story and (aside from a few areas that I guess they’re saving for story missions) I think I unlocked the whole map. I’m glad that it’s not all city, there is some countryside within the city walls. (about half the map is fields with small groupings of buildings)

I haven’t played multiplayer yet, but I’ll probably do some today. I did the tutorial, and it’s a bit more in-depth than I thought it would be. As you level up, you unlock different gear sets which, I think, unlock new abilities. (I could just do free running and assassinating, but there are supposed to be decoys, smoke bombs, and it looks like stunning strikes)

Read full topic
